actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to provide coverage under the Federal old-age, survivors, and disability insurance system for all Members of Congress and other officers and employees in the legislative branch of the Government.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Fairness Act of 1981 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code and title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage under the Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance program for Members of Congress and Congressional employees.

titles.title: A bill to provide coverage under the Federal old-age, survivors, and disability insurance system for all Members of Congress and other officers and employees in the legislative branch of the Government.
